page.title: 01Budleigh Salterton
page.content: { Budleigh Salterton is a small coastal {town of about 5000 people.It is {between Exmouth and Sidmouth and is {well known as a select seaside resort {which is quiet and unspoilt. {The beach,together with the red Devon {cliffs and a superb surrounding {countryside make the town an ideal {centre for a restful holiday.The beach {is clean,clear and safe.Beach huts may {be hired.There is also a cricket club {at the Eastern end of the seafront; {angling competitions on the beach and {the golf course is within a mile of {the town.There are facilities for lawn {tennis,croquet and rifle shooting. { { { { { { }H
